description.value:
Utility (built into module). Use this item to open the Garou form picker dialog and switch between Homid, Glabro, Crinos, Hispo, and Lupus. Requires the Item Macro module with Override preUseItem Hook enabled, or drag the world macro Garou: Choose Form to your hotbar.

Garou with the Shapeshifting Forms feature can drag this onto their sheet for quick access, or use the Shapeshifting Forms feat itself (if Item Macro is enabled).

macro.name: Choose Garou Form
macro.command: const macro = game.macros.find(m => m.name === "Garou: Choose Form"); if (macro) await macro.execute(false, [{ actor: this.actor || this.item?.actor, token: this.token, item: this.item }]);
